title: Update Email Preferences
description: A customer wants to unsubscribe from marketing emails but continue receiving order notifications.

tasks.description: The customer clicks the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of a marketing email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is taken to the email preference center page.

tasks.description: On the preference page, the customer unchecks the box for 'Marketing & Promotions'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer indicates their preference to opt out of marketing.

tasks.description: The system saves the preferences, removing the customer from marketing lists but keeping them on transactional email lists.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's preferences are honored, maintaining a positive relationship.
